div.p: The project described in this publication was supported by Cooperative Agreement no. G15AC00351 from the United States Geological Survey (USGS) National Climate Adaptation Science Center, USA. We would like to thank the reviewers for the comments on the on the manuscript. The datasets we used here are publicity available and derived from secondary sources. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government.
